name: MTLAccelerationStructureTriangleGeometryDescriptor
desc: A description of a list of triangle primitives to turn into an acceleration structure.

items.name: var triangleCount: Int
items.desc: The number of triangles in the buffers.

items.name: var indexBuffer: MTLBuffer?
items.desc: A buffer that contains indices for the vertices that compose the triangle list.

items.name: var indexType: MTLIndexType
items.desc: The data type of indices in the index buffer.

items.name: var indexBufferOffset: Int
items.desc: The offset, in bytes, to the first index in the buffer.

items.name: var vertexBuffer: MTLBuffer?
items.desc: A buffer that contains vertex data.

items.name: var vertexBufferOffset: Int
items.desc: The offset, in bytes, for the first vertex in the vertex buffer.

items.name: var vertexStride: Int
items.desc: The stride, in bytes, between vertices in the vertex buffer.
